text: Soni iyyoyopeyo (yatwatite pakwatuluchisya itabu achimitume ŵakala) tuntuluchisye (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) Chitabu (cha Qur’an), sano aŵala ŵatwapele chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) akuchikulupilila chalakwechi (Qur’an), nambo soni mwa ŵanganyaŵa (ŵarabu ŵanganitwatumichisyeje chitabu chilichose) mwana ŵaakuchikulupilila chalakwechi, ni pangali ŵagakana ma Ȃya Getu ikaŵeje achimakafili
